Hogan went in through the screen door and

It was just starting to get fall weather and itâs
nice country there in Jersey, up in the hills, and

I asked.
âOh, I keep in touch with them,â Hogan

âHim?â said Hogan. âCan you see him doing

Jack sat down on the porch by me. He leaned

We sat there on the porch. Hogan was inside

âWhat do you think about the shape Iâm in?â

âI donât think you ought to work any more,â

âWouldnât that be awful?â Jack says and
